pageContent:
NAGA R NEELI 
Phone: (678) 956-4218  Email: neelinag@gmail.com Linkedin:https://www.linkedin.com/in/nagarneeli 
US Citizen 
--------------------------------------------------------- 
SUMMARY:  
Experience in client/server and Multi-tier distributed applications, Agile/DevOps environment exposure. Experience in Tel-
ecommunications (AT&T) and Retail Systems (Dollar General) domain. Experience in manual and automated testing. Look-
ing  for  a  role  where  I  can  exhibit  my  skills  and  expertise  around  Release/Deployment/Ticketing/Security/Support  and  Cli-
ent relationship. 
Excellent Communication, Interpersonal, Collaborative Relations, People Leadership skills.  
  SKILLS: 
  Languages/Framework: Java,/J2EE,  Python, XML, SAML, SQL, PL/SQL, HTML, Java Script, UNIX Shells 
  RDBMS:        Oracle, PostgreSQL 
  Networking:  SOAP, SNMP, TCP/IP 
  Operating Systems: UNIX (Solaris, Sco, AIX), Linux, MS-DOS, Windows  
  Application Server: Weblogic, IIS

RDBMS:        Oracle, PostgreSQL 
  Networking:  SOAP, SNMP, TCP/IP 
  Operating Systems: UNIX (Solaris, Sco, AIX), Linux, MS-DOS, Windows  
  Application Server: Weblogic, IIS

  Tools:   Microsoft 365, SharePoint, Powershell, SVN, XMLSpy, SOA Test, Selenium, SOAP UI, JUnit, SQL-Developer, 
     Ant, Maven, GitHub, Jenkins, yaml, Jira. i-Track, servicenow, ITIL Framework, Datadog(kubernetes -SaaS 
     service(SRE), Terraform, Ansible(IaC), Salesforce Mountaineer, Mulesoft, AI Fundamentals 
 
Apr 2014-Dec 2023 Service Project Manager/Lead(Cognizant) at AT&T Retail Sales Delivery, GA 
2011 - 2013 SSA/Associate Manager at Accenture, GA 
2010 - 2011 Senior Analyst at Manhattan Associates, GA  
2010 - 2010  Senior Analyst at Dollar General Corporation, TN 
2008 - 2009 Consultant at AT&T , GA 
  Summary of Roles/Responsibilities and Accomplishments:

2010 - 2010  Senior Analyst at Dollar General Corporation, TN 
2008 - 2009 Consultant at AT&T , GA 
  Summary of Roles/Responsibilities and Accomplishments: 
 
 Experience in user management, security settings, data management, and workflow automation. Skilled in 
configuring and maintaining Salesforce environments, customizing using Lightning Component. 
 Accomplished easier and quicker deployments to Stage/PVT and Prod environments by automating scripts to 
use configuration parameters for daily and release validations. 
 Increased  the  efficiency  and  usage  of  reports  for  easier  analysis  on  deployment  ,  support  and  configuration 
related items. 
 Streamlined  the  process  of  maintaining  vulnerabilities  and  their  status  for  easier tracking  and  maintenance 
purposes. 
 Coordinated with Onsite and Offshore team on a daily and need basis for various tasks related to the projects.

purposes. 
 Coordinated with Onsite and Offshore team on a daily and need basis for various tasks related to the projects. 
 Have Tracked Vulnerabilities(related to security and compliance) using servicenow and coordinating with the 
corresponding teams for due dates and completion 
 Prepared and presented regular security reports to management, highlighting key metrics, trends, and areas 
of concern. Documented and reported incidents, findings, and remediation steps to relevant stakeholders. 
 I have contrubuted towards mentoring, interview/recruiting process on the need basis. 
 Did Onboarding and training of new team members on deployment and support related activities. 
 Weekend and Off hours on-call support and interacting with Offshore team for effective turnarounds. 
 Improved Business Process , project life cycle, system life cycle, change management, defect tracking.

 Improved Business Process , project life cycle, system life cycle, change management, defect tracking. 
 Did  release  validations, SSL certificates  expiry  checks  to  build  trust,  achieve  compliance,  and protect  against 
various  cyber threats,  renewals  using  Venafi/Keyfactor  tools  and  sending  success/failure  status  reports  to 
Leadership teams.  
 Contributing to checks and balances to limit unilateral decision making, Ticketing, Issue tracking. 
 Helped  in  configuration,  deployment,  testing  and  support  activities  as  needed  for  various Java/J2EE based 
applications. 
 Prior  experience  in  dealing  with  Databases  (Oracle), UNIX, Shell  Scripting,  XML,  SOAP based  web  services 
and testing web services using SOA Test, SOAP UI tools. 
 Did Integration, System and end to end testing of the software in different testing environments.

 Interacted with end users, business for requirements gathering, functional queries.  
 Involved in SDLC, Estimations, Project Plan, planning poker, User stories, sprints,  manual and automatic test-
ing of Java based standalone and multi-tier applications. 
 Did Cron job setups, configuring and running batch jobs. Scheduled automated nightly builds using Jenkins. 
 CPS Azure migration involvement doing the image deployments for App, Web and Batch VM, CI/CD pipeline 
creation, Deployment Center, azure portal, subscriptions, resource  groups, IaaS, PaaS, etc. 
 
EDUCATION:  
 Master of Computer Applications   Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, India 
 Bachelor of Sciences   Nizam College (Autonomous), India 
 
CERTIFICATION: 
 1)Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals 2)Scrum Master Accredited Certification 
 3)ITIL 4.0 Foundation Learning

3)ITIL 4.0 Foundation Learning
